item.title: Implementing Level of Identification (LoI) with ASP.NET Core Identity and Duende
item.description: This article explores how to implement Level of Identification (LOI) in an ASP.NET Core application. The solution uses Duende IdentityServer as the OpenID Connect provider and ASP.NET Core Identity for user management. Identity verification is performed using the Swiyu Public Beta infrastructure. Any OpenID Connect client can consume the loi claim together with the loa [â€¦] Link to article: https://damienbod.com/2026/01/18/implementing-level-of-identification-loi-with-asp-net-core-identity-and-duende/
